LanguageData.Turret_single20mmGun.description: 需要人员操作的波佛斯厄利孔20毫米机炮。当解构时留下枪箱
LanguageData.Artillery_single20mmGun.label: 20mm flak
LanguageData.Artillery_single20mmGun.description: Oerlikon 20mm gun. need to be manned. drop gun crate upon deconstruction.
LanguageData.Turret_Dual20mmGun.label: Twin Oerlikon
LanguageData.Turret_Dual20mmGun.description: dual 20mm gun turret. need to be manned. drop gun crate upon deconstruction.
LanguageData.Artillery_Dual20mmGun.label: Twin 20mm
LanguageData.Artillery_Dual20mmGun.description: dual 20mm gun. its shield protects the gunner. need to be manned. drop gun crate upon deconstruction.
LanguageData.Turret_Quad20mmGun.label: quad oerlikon
LanguageData.Turret_Quad20mmGun.description: 4 20m guns thrret. has very good protection. need to be manned. drop gun crate upon deconstruction.
LanguageData.Artillery_Quad20mmGun.label: quad Oerlikon
LanguageData.Artillery_Quad20mmGun.description: quad 20mm flak guns. need to be manned. drop gun crate upon deconstruction.
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Oerlikon.label: Oerlikon 20mm gun crate
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Oerlikon.description: uses 20mm shell. too heavp to hold and you must make a mount for it.
